name: Loopcoin
description: Loopcoin ($LPC) is a deflationary token with a unique reinvestment mechanism. A 0.25% fee on every buy and 0.25% fee on every sell is collected into a transparent treasury. The treasury uses these funds to buy back $LPC tokens from the open market and permanently burn them â€” reducing circulating supply over time. 50% of Tokens (500 million) are Locked via Smart Contract until 11/01/2025 and will vest very slowly thereafter.
